name: Caveman Capers
overview:
Ogg the Caveman has discovered a new form of transport - Kickstart the Turtle. All day long he tries to train Kickstart to jump and run. However, the turtle isn't too keen and Kickstart keeps falling flat on his face.

Help Ogg master the art of turtle-riding and get him to the phonebox to tell his wife he'll be late for tea.
